document.title: Development Window Preferences
document.paragraph:
This category gathers a list of preferences related to the development window in EiffelStudio.
1
Label in the preferences window Complete Description
Is maximizedIs window maximized?
Left panel use explorer styleShow only one tool (Features, Clusters, Search, Windows) at a time. (Requires restart)
Window left panel widthWidth of navigation panel
Left panel layoutItems/tools information for navigation panel.
Right panel layoutItems/tools information for editor panel.
Show general_toolbarShould general toolbar be shown?
Show text in general_toolbarShould text be shown in general toolbar?
Show all text in general_toolbarIs text of toolbar items displayed?
Show address toolbarShould address toolbar be shown?
Show project toolbarShould project toolbar be shown?
Search tool show_optionsShould search tool be shown?
General toolbar layoutItems shown in general toolbar.
Maximum history sizeMaximum number of items displayed in the history combo boxes.
Remember completion list sizeShould size of completion list be remembered between completions in the editor?
Expand feature treeAutomatically expand the feature tree.
Editor left sideDisplay editor on left? (Requires restart)
Ctrl right click_receiverReceivers of control-right-click.
Progress bar colorColor for progress bar.
History sizeBrowsing history size
Dock trackingDocked tools track main window?
Last browsed cluster directoryDirectory of last browsed cluster.
Feature clause orderOrder used to sort feature clauses in formatted texts.
